title: All Her Fault: Sarah Snook's Terrifying Missing Child Drama Everyone Is Bingeing
shortdescription: Succession star returns in nail-biting thriller about a playdate gone horribly wrong.
description: Sarah Snook plays a mother whose son vanishes after a playdate – paranoia, secrets, and suburban suspicion explode in Peacock's hottest new series.
author: TV Insider

title: Death By Lightning: Michael Shannon & Matthew Macfadyen in Explosive Presidential Assassination Series
shortdescription: Game of Thrones creators tackle the forgotten Garfield assassination – critics call it 'masterful'.
description: Netflix's gripping historical thriller starring Michael Shannon as President Garfield and Matthew Macfadyen as his unhinged killer is 2025's must-watch prestige drama.

author: TV Insider

title: All's Fair: Kim Kardashian & Glenn Close in Ryan Murphy's Cutthroat Divorce Lawyer Drama
shortdescription: Kim K goes full attorney mode in the fiercest, glossiest legal series of the year.
description: Ryan Murphy's star-studded Hulu drama about elite LA divorce lawyers (Kim Kardashian, Glenn Close, Halle Berry) is serving scandal, secrets, and courtroom fireworks.
